variants.Description in input context: c.1675G>A (p.G559S), a pathogenic mutation associated with parkinsonism

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with wild-type and mutant PINK1 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.G559S mutation significantly reduced PINK1's E3 ligase activity, impairing its ability to ubiquitinate substrates.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in three independent biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PINK1 ubiquitination activity â‰¥ 80% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: PINK1 ubiquitination activity < 50% of wild-type levels
